- **Gene Name:** plant intracellular ras group-related LRR 8

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [cfm6-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Plieotrophic effects on growth and development. Severely stunted growth, short roots, overall small stature. Reduced fertility, abnormal pollen.Small, wrinkled seed.
